question: What are the violation codes for the listed items?
evidence:
NOTICE OF PROBABLE VIOLATION 
and 
PROPOSED CIVIL PENALTY 

OVERNIGHT EXPRESS DELIVERY 

June 1, 2023 

Mr. Paul Ruppert 
President and Chief Executive Officer 
Eastern Gas Transmission and Storage, Inc. 
6603 West Broad Street 
Richmond, Virginia 23200 

Dear Mr. Ruppert: 

CPF 1-2023-027-NOPV 

From November 15, 2021, to November 19, 2021, via on-site inspection, representatives of the 
Pipeline  and  Hazardous  Materials  Safety  Administration  (PHMSA),  Office  of  Pipeline  Safety 
(OPS),  pursuant  to  Chapter  601  of  49  United  States  Code  (U.S.C.)

inspected  Eastern  Gas 
Transmission and Storage, Inc.’s (EGT&S) procedures and records for control room management 
of its control room in Bridgeport, West Virginia.

Therefore, EGT&S failed to maintain records that demonstrate compliance with § 192.631(f)(2) 
as required pursuant to § 192.631(j)(1).
